entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 07:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -37.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
